title: My account name
body:
Hi,

So I signed up to league as a beta tester waaaaaay back. Anyway. I played a bit here and there but haven't been on in a while.
Just wanted to find out what is up with my forum name? It's some complicated string - is this the norm?

My nick I signed up with was Jasper so not sure what's happening

replies.body: Are you logged into the same account as the one with that nickname?  The name I'm seeing here usually occurs when a name becomes inactive or an account doesn't make a summoner name.  Let me know if that clears things up!
